attributes.action: enact legislation providing that UK nationals cannot leave the UK (especially to enter The Peoples Republic of China) during a FIFA European Championship or FIFA World Cup Championship year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This legislation would ensure an increase in economic growth for the country by increasing the amount of spending per person on alcohol and associated snacks, providing a much needed boost to the over taxed licensed retail industry. It will also ensure a better quality of life for British citizens as they reflect upon the summer festivities over the following 6 months.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
